name: Property Description
summary: Learn about .PROPDESC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Examples of elements that may be included in a PROPDESC file include searchInfo, labelInfo, typeInfo, aliasInfo, and displayInfo. Common attributes include data type, label, and help string.

description: XML file that describes properties that can be searched using Windows Search; created for properties that are not already in the property system; must be stored in a global location (not a user directory) in order to function correctly.
